title: Tools of the Trade: Linux and SQL
description: Google Cybersecurity Professional Certificate course focused on Linux and SQL fundamentals, including navigating and managing the file system via Bash, handling file permissions, and authenticating and authorizing users.

title: Connect and Protect: Networks and Network Security
description: Google Cybersecurity Professional Certificate course focused on network fundamentals and practical network security concepts (protocols, common controls, and how to reduce attack surface).

title: Play It Safe: Manage Security Risks
description: Google Cybersecurity Professional Certificate course focused on identifying and managing security risks, and applying practical security controls and basic compliance concepts.

title: Foundations of Cybersecurity
description: Google Cybersecurity Professional Certificate course introducing the security field, core responsibilities of entry-level security analysts, essential skills and knowledge, and how security analysts protect networks and information.
